channel.title: How to get support with MESG
channel.description:
Welcome to our support category! This is where you can post questions and the team and other members of the community can help.
You can ask questions about anything you like here, but please try to (**1**) [first review our documentation](https://docs.mesg.com/), and (**2**) use that search box at the top of the forum to search for your query first - someone may have already asked it!
If not, go ahead and ask your questions. Please try to be as detailed as possible. Thanks for using MESG!
